trans-unit.source: Wait for a debugger to attach before executing the command.
trans-unit.target: Дождитесь подключения отладчика, прежде чем выполнять команду.

trans-unit.source: Enable debug logging to the console.
The Aspire CLI can be used to create, run, and publish Aspire-based applications.
trans-unit.target: CLI Aspire можно использовать для создания, запуска и публикации приложений на основе Aspire.

trans-unit.source:
Telemetry ---------
The Aspire CLI collects usage data in order to help us improve your experience. It is collected by Microsoft and shared with the community. You can opt-out of telemetry by setting the ASPIRE_CLI_TELEMETRY_OPTOUT environment variable to '1' or 'true' using your favorite shell.
Read more about Aspire CLI telemetry: https://aka.ms/aspire/cli-telemetry
trans-unit.target:
Telemetry ---------
The Aspire CLI collects usage data in order to help us improve your experience. It is collected by Microsoft and shared with the community. You can opt-out of telemetry by setting the ASPIRE_CLI_TELEMETRY_OPTOUT environment variable to '1' or 'true' using your favorite shell.
Read more about Aspire CLI telemetry: https://aka.ms/aspire/cli-telemetry

trans-unit.source: Welcome to Aspire! Learn more about Aspire at https://aspire.dev
trans-unit.target: Welcome to Aspire! Learn more about Aspire at https://aspire.dev

trans-unit.source: Suppress the startup banner and telemetry notice.
trans-unit.target: Suppress the startup banner and telemetry notice.

trans-unit.source: Wait for a debugger to attach before executing the command.
trans-unit.target: Дождитесь подключения отладчика, прежде чем выполнять команду.

trans-unit.source: Waiting for debugger to attach to CLI process ID: {0}
